roleset.name: brave
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5, dare-v.01.

example.name: Adjectival rel: daring; arg0
example.text: I tell ya , what I 'd really like to do is push the wall out a couple feet and put in a bath / shower , but I 'm not that handy or daring .

example.name: Adjectival rel: daring; args 0, 2, empty it
example.text: it was daring of them to feature Diane.
